Query_Set_1: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE status = 'active';
Query_Set_2: SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2024-01-01';
Query_Set_3: SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'; SELECT * FROM categories;

Query_Set_1: SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.hire_date > '2020-01-01';
Query_Set_2: SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name, SUM(t.amount) as total_sales FROM stores s JOIN transactions t ON s.store_id = t.store_id WHERE t.date BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' GROUP BY s.store_id, s.store_name;
Query_Set_3: SELECT user_id, username FROM users UNION SELECT admin_id, admin_name FROM admins;

Query_Set_2: SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(o.order_id) as order_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(o.order_id) > 5;
Query_Set_3: SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.price > 100 AND s.country = 'USA';
